title: Full Stack Developer - SSL Glossys (Global Operation and Shipping System)
description: Designed and developed a comprehensive logistics and vessel management platform for a shipping company. The system manages bookings, Bill of Lading (BL), freight control, master data, and EDI transmissions, enabling seamless coordination between operational, finance, and scheduling teams while enhancing transparency and data accuracy across the organization.
tasks: Create Local Charge Master Module (FE & BE)
Create Transaction Local Charge Module (FE & BE)
Enhancement existing feature and maintaining existing
Create Report using Jasper
Developed an interactive freight cost management module with real-time data validation.
Migrated AngularJS-based legacy systems to Angular 10+ with improved UX consistency.
Integrated Spring Boot microservices for master data and transaction sync.
Worked closely with business analysts to digitize manual data-entry workflows.
achievements: Enhanced user interface and UX consistency.
Optimized data retrieval and validation processes in Local Charge and Transaction Charge modules, improving response speed and reducing manual corrections.
Developed integrated Jasper reports for billing and freight control, enabling automated financial summaries.
Improved synchronization between master data and transactional modules through Spring Boot microservices.
